meanings.sent1: After school, his wonted routine was to play video games for an hour.
meanings.sent2: The cat found comfort in its wonted spot by the window.
meanings.sent3: The dog's wonted reaction to the doorbell was to bark loudly.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a fish out of water in this new city, missing her wonted surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh bread baking in the morning was a wonted delight for her.

meanings.sent1: Her wonted response to stress was to take a deep breath and count to ten.
meanings.sent2: The wonted route to the grocery store was closed for construction.
meanings.sent3: The wonted rainy weather ruined their plans for a picnic.
meanings.sent4: The wonted silence of the library was broken by a loud sneeze.
meanings.sent5: The wonted smile on her face brightened up the room.

meanings.sent1: He was wonted to believe everything he read online.
meanings.sent2: The child was wonted to ask a lot of questions about the world around him.
meanings.sent3: The cat was wonted to climb up the curtains when it wanted attention.
meanings.sent4: She was wonted to give in to her cravings for chocolate late at night.
